تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن


Dear Fellow,

70% of international ventures fail due to cultural misunderstandings — not strategy. In today’s global market, leadership isn't just about leading people — it’s about leading across values, mindsets, and communication styles.


Event Title:
Leadership Across Borders & Culture


Event Details:
Dates: 8–10 December 2025
Venue: Dusit Thani Hotel, Dubai, U.A.E.
Trainer: Georgina Barquin — Global Leadership Strategist & Award-Winning Educator with 17,000+ training hours across 3 continents

chunks.text:
Event Details:
Dates: 8–10 December 2025
Venue: Dusit Thani Hotel, Dubai, U.A.E.
Trainer: Georgina Barquin — Global Leadership Strategist & Award-Winning Educator with 17,000+ training hours across 3 continents


Key Topics You’ll Explore:
• Why culture impacts decision-making more than personality
• Practical tools for decoding unfamiliar leadership styles
• Frameworks to build trust across task- and relationship-based cultures
• Strategies for turning cultural complexity into a competitive edge


Who Should Attend:
C-suite leaders, HR/L&D heads, project managers, sales and operations directors, and anyone leading multicultural teams or expanding internationally.


Attachment Reference:
Full agenda, schedule, and trainer profile are detailed in the attached brochure.


Best regards,
Zainab Alwani
Marketing Outreach Manager
Zainab@corpexposure.com
